mapper.select: SELECT a.*, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b.`color` ORDER BY b.`prodNo` DESC SEPARATOR ', ') AS `color`, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b.`size` ORDER BY b.`prodNo` DESC SEPARATOR ', ') AS `size` FROM `product` AS a LEFT JOIN `product_option` AS b ON a.`prodNo`=b.`prodNo` GROUP BY `prodNo` ORDER BY `prodNo` DESC LIMIT 16;
